Legal & Compliance

Legal Notice, Terms & Conditions

This page outlines how Quantum Automatacollaborates with clients, handles data securely, and ensures that every automation product is built on ethical and regulatory foundations.

Ethical Automation

We follow strict review processes so every model and workflow is explainable, bias-tested, and aligned with regulatory expectations.

Security by Design

Infrastructure is hardened with encryption, access controls, and continuous monitoring to keep your data protected end-to-end.

Regulatory Alignment

Solutions are mapped to financial, commercial, and data protection frameworks relevant across African markets and global partners.

Terms & Conditions

These terms apply to all engagements, pilot programs, and platform subscriptions. Specific contract terms may expand on the clauses below.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using Quantum Automataproducts, platforms, or services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions. If you are using our services on behalf of an organization, you represent that you have the authority to bind that organization to these terms.

2. Services & Licensing

We provide AI-driven software, automation platforms, consulting, and support services. Unless stated otherwise, all deliverables and platform access are licensed, not sold. Clients receive a non-transferable, non-exclusive license to use our solutions strictly for agreed business purposes.

3. Data Protection & Privacy

We implement enterprise-grade security controls, encryption, and ongoing audits to protect customer data. Where we process personal or financial data on your behalf, we act as a data processor and comply with relevant regulations (e.g., NDPR, GDPR where applicable). Clients remain the data controller and are responsible for lawful data collection and usage.

4. Compliance & Responsible AI

Our products are built with ethical AI guardrails and auditability. Clients agree to deploy our technology responsibly, comply with applicable laws, and avoid use cases that could violate privacy, promote harm, or discriminate against protected classes.

5. Payment & Termination

All invoices are due within the agreed payment window. Failure to pay may result in suspension of services. Either party may terminate with written notice if the other breaches a material obligation and fails to remedy within 30 days. Upon termination, licenses revert to Quantum Automata Limited.

6. Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, Quantum Automatais not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our total cumulative liability arising from any contract will not exceed the fees paid during the twelve (12) months preceding the event giving rise to the claim.

Legal Contact & Notices

For contractual questions, regulatory inquiries, or requests relating to data subject rights, reach our compliance desk directly. We aim to respond within two business days.
